description: Example todo structure for coding tasks following the design → implement → test pattern

todos.content: Design authentication flow and API endpoints (login, logout, refresh)
Implement JWT-based authentication with token generation and validation
Write unit tests for authentication logic and edge cases
Test end-to-end authentication workflow with integration tests

best_practices: Design before implementing to catch issues early
Include testing as explicit todo (not afterthought)
Make completion criteria clear and measurable
Update status to 'in_progress' when starting, 'completed' when done
